title: My account password keeps changing?
body: I can log on to my other accounts, but i cant seem to long on to my one account. this has happened before and i simply changed password. Should i be scared?

replies.body:
It's possible that the email associated with your account is compromised, allowing someone to reset or change the password at will. I strongly recommend taking the steps in [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to secure your account, along with changing the password to whatever email is associated with the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Nooo don't worry about it sounds like you got mutli accts maybe u forgot some thing pretty simple. If you worryd about it just note your pass in your phone for each acct.
well, yes your account might be hacked.
